basics.name: Vy Ai Vo, Ph.D.
basics.label: AI/ML Research Scientist
basics.summary: I am a research scientist in the Brain-Inspired Computing Lab, which is part of Intelligent Systems Research at Intel Labs.
basics.current: I am currently working on vector similarity search, language models, and models of memory in machine learning. You can find links to my publications on the CV page.
basics.former: My PhD is in cognitive computational neuroscience, particularly studying attention and memory.
